meanings.definition: Resembling an eel in appearance or movement.
meanings.sent1: The slippery creature had an eellike body, moving gracefully through the water.
meanings.sent2: The long, slender fish swam in an eellike manner, twisting and turning effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The eellike robot slithered across the floor, surprising everyone with its agility.
meanings.sent4: Her dance moves were so eellike, it was as if she was gliding on water.
meanings.sent5: The eellike shadows danced on the wall, creating a mesmerizing effect.
